Other Elements

Well

A well is designed to help a short statement of text stand out on the page. The padding around the well can be modified by adding a class of well-large or well-small

This text is important so it is inside a well. 
<div class="well">
	<!-- Well Text -->
</div>

Icons

<i class="icon-facebook"></i>
<i class="icon-twitter"></i>
<i class="icon-youtube"></i>
<i class="icon-soundcloud"></i>
<i class="icon-linkedin"></i>
<i class="icon-email"></i>

Clearfix

The clearfix class can be used to clear floated elements. Use this when you wish to give put the element on it's own line without other elements floating up around it.

/* The CSS generated by the Clearfix class */
.clearfix {
    *zoom: 1;
}
.clearfix:before, .clearfix:after {
    display: table;
    content: "";
}
.clearfix:after {
    clear: both;
}

Line Break

The hr class can be used to seperate content.

/* The CSS generated by the HR tag */

<hr>

}

Homepage Carousel

Slide Heading

This is the text associated with the slide

Slide Heading

This is the text associated with the slide

<div class="carousel slide" id="myCarousel">
	<div class="carousel-inner">
		<div class="item">
			<img src="">
			<div class="carousel-caption">
				<h4>Slide Heading</h4>
				<p>This is the text associated with the slide</p>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
